caption.title: Related to Fig 6. Successful knockdown of siRNA targets.
caption.p: Western blot analysis of cell lysates from Fig 6A and 6B and S11 Fig., to test knock-down efficiency of clathrin heavy chain, dynamin I/II, and caveolin-1. Representative image shown from 3 independent Western blots. Î±-Tubulin is included as a loading control.
